bibl.title: Septuagint and Reception. Essays Prepared for the Association for the Study of the Septuagint in South Africa
bibl.note: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 39205 = P. Bingen 16 (= LDAB 7997). - 1. A Fragment of a Codex Containing Psalms LXX. - 2. The Date of P. Vindob. G 39205. [Second half of V or beginning of VI C.E.]. - 3. The Secondary Use of P. Vindob. G 39205. [The apotropaic use of the parchment fragment remains doubtful.]
